metadata.title: Threadrock Big Girls' Heart of Dinosaurs Fitted T-Shirt
features: Threadrock exclusive; child/youth girls tee; 100% combed ringspun cotton; fabric laundered for reduced shrinkage
Style: Slim fit, longer body length | Size: Runs small, size up for looser fit
*OFFICIAL SIZING* (width x length measured in inches): S (6/6X) - 12.5" x 20" | M (7/8) - 13.5" x 21" | L (10/12) - 15" x 23" | XL (14/16) - 16.5" x 25"
Size specs approximate due to manufacturing variations
Design features white dinosaurs shaped into a heart. Perfect for those dinosaur lovers to wear on Valentine's Day or any day!
description: Threadrock exclusive, available in selected sizes and colors. Tees are 100% combed ringspun cotton and fully machine washable.
